metadata.title: CVE-2022-38853 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow viafunction asf_init_audio_stream() of libmpdemux/asfheader.c. This affectsmplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

criterions.comment: mplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
